Participants.evidence: 13 centers contributed 148 patients with breast cancer

Intervention.evidence: Each patient received [ 99m Tc]tilmanocept and vital blue dye (VBD)

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary endpoint, concordance (lower boundary set point at 90 %), was the proportion of nodes detected by VBD and [ 99m Tc]tilmanocept

Result_Outcome.evidence: 207 of 209 nodes detected by VBD were also detected by [ 99m Tc]tilmanocept for a concordance rate of 99.04 % ( p < 0.0001)

Harms.evidence: No serious adverse events were attributed to [ 99m Tc]tilmanocept
